entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #46871
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #46865
  • JsonSubkeyClaimAction arrays #46864
  • Add an option to AuthorizationMessageHandler to not throw if unable to get token #46862
    Backlog
  • [SignalR] Server doesn't stop streaming after cancellation on client #46861
  • DeveloperExceptionPage showing and disappearing fast #46859
  • WebAuthn API Support #46858
  • [Analyzer] mismatch of routing template and name with FromRoute attribute in API controller #46857
  • Razor pages handlers does not support IConvertToActionResult #46855

Closed

  • Performance difference: QueryCompilation #46872
  • Perf regression: updates #46866
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo: This throws an exception #46849
  • Blazor insertion into List issue with method OnInitialized #46795
  • Blazor WASM Standalone #46846
  • name claim does not seem to be full qualified #46388
  • Provide a way for ByPassing Authentication & Authorization with Server token #46569
  • HttpLogging middleware should have an option to filter out endpoints #40950
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Improve Model Binding for HTTP Request Body as Stream #41426
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot use JSON source generator with (HttpValidation)ProblemDetails #43236
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Hotreload not working with .cshtml files #38809
    8.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: updates #46840
  • Perf improvement: caching #46856
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR dotnet client #46705
    8.0-preview2
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46808
    8.0-preview2
  • SignalR - OnConnectedAsync not triggered if utilized in partial class #46841
  • Pipeline is executed when request isn't allowed by CORS policy #46766
  • Azure AD B2C does not return User Name claim in default project #46852

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #46870
    area-signalr
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview3 #46863
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert "Defer search for dev cert until build bind time (#46296)" #46868
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Add 'dotnet new' web item templates (razor view, api controller, mvc controller) #46714
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview2
  • Update Selenium versions #46790
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Retry ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows test #46718
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46842
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46844
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.15
  • Avoid more UnobservedTaskExceptions in SignalR .NET client #46781
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview2
  • Suggest team members to run CI checks for long-standing PRs #46848
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security
  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • [RDG] Support serializing polymorphic response types with STJ #46791
    area-web-frameworks
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Metrics factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution
